title: 大家记得第一次建的火柴盒是多大吗
author: Bilang丶碧浪

replies.author: 我的工业2
replies.txt_content:
1x1x3【滑稽】
很幸运当晚没有小白发现我

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 不算墙壁是4×4×2

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 第一个火柴盒大约是7x7吧，当然算上墙壁

replies.author: 彪悍的新手
replies.txt_content: 哎我怎么这么健忘

replies.author: I_am_god_Father
replies.txt_content: 貌似是465

replies.author: 无奈丶屮艸
replies.txt_content:
17X13X9，算墙壁
突然发现我的跟你们对比起来好♂大。。。。

replies.author: 逗比孩呵呵
replies.txt_content: 3*3 啊         呵呵

replies.author: LINCHUTI
replies.txt_content: 这个......我都是随便建个高度的

replies.author: 小帅最帅比
replies.txt_content: 你们确定建的是火柴盒？

replies.author: yanshuchen
replies.txt_content: 我第一次玩的时候  都是正经的房子 没什么火柴盒- -

replies.author: 宁静^致远
replies.txt_content: 3x3x3...地下室，不算吧qwq

replies.author: 安梦梦
replies.txt_content: 算上墙壁是3*3的

replies.author: 黑夜如影
replies.txt_content: 6*6的，很难忘的，那时候满满的梦想！

replies.author: 剑圣丿归来
replies.txt_content: 没有火柴盒  住地下

replies.author: Blacktout
replies.txt_content: 10X10X10算上墙壁 A.A

replies.author: 幻影访客
replies.txt_content: 两层，一层是5格，共3室。

replies.author: 发光的木板
replies.txt_content: 3x4 吧。。简直6

replies.txt_content: 我还是拿泥土和木头混建的小房子呢
